description.text: The function getRegisteredClients can be used to get the list of currently registered transaction log clients.
Die Funktion getRegisteredClients kann verwendet werden, um die Liste der derzeit registrierten Transaktionslog-Clients zu ermitteln.

If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality solely to authenticated users, the function SHALL check if the user that has invoked the function has the status authenticated. If the status is not authenticated, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer authentifiziert. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authenticated THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthenticated EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT authentifiziert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthenticated BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: If the referencing guideline limits the access to the functionality to certain roles, the function SHALL check in the corresponding role if the (unauthenticated) user is authorized to execute the function. If the user is not authorized, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized and exit the function.
Prüft, ob Nutzer berechtigt. Falls nicht: Exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized, Ende.

pseudocode.text: IF user NOT authorized THEN THROW ErrorUserNotAuthorized EXIT function END
WENN Benutzer NICHT autorisiert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthorized BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

description.text: The function SHALL determine all registered clients. If the determination of this fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorGetRegisteredClientsFailed and exit the function.
Ermittelt alle registrierten Clients. Bei Fehler: Exception ErrorGetRegisteredClientsFailed, Ende.

pseudocode.text: TRY RETRIEVE registered clients from SE CATCH error THROW ErrorGetRegisteredClientsFailed EXIT function END
VERSUCHE HOLE registrierte Clients vom SE BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorGetRegisteredClientsFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

trigger.text: The determination of registered clients fails

description.text: If the determination of the registered clients was successful, the function SHALL return client information of all currently registered clients by usage of the output parameter registeredClients. Additionally, the function SHALL return without raising an exception to indicate that the execution of the function has been successful.
Bei Erfolg der Ermittlung: Gibt Client-Informationen aller registrierten Clients via Parameter registeredClients zurück. Keine Exception.

pseudocode.text: GEBE Client-Informationen zurück (registeredClients Parameter) RETURN ohne Exception

condition.text: The determination of registered clients has been successful

action.text: Return client information without raising an exception

description.text: list of registered clients (and their registration time).
Liste der registrierten Clients (und ihre Registrierungszeit).
